participant_1.background:
I'm not sure what a fortune teller could tell me, but I'm sure they'd be impressed by my talents and my love for my family.
I made sure to take my dog on a walk every day while I was on vacation.
My weekdays are spent in a stuffy office, but on the weekends I put on my uniform and fight for the Union.
I've been in a bit of a funk since my house was robbed, but creating new recipes always helps me feel better.
i like to train dogs.

participant_2.background:
I don't have any pets, because I'm too busy with my cosplay gear and working out to take care of them.
i love fishing.
I am blind and my family are my eyes.
I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
My memories of my grandmother, who used to make the best mac and cheese in the world.

content.text: I'm not sure what a fortune teller could tell me, but I'm sure they'd be impressed by my talents and my love for my family.
What are some of your talents?
I'm a pretty good cook and I love to train dogs.
That's awesome! I'm not really into cooking, but I love fishing.
That's a good hobby! I'm too busy with my job to really enjoy it.
What do you do for work?
I work in a stuffy office during the week, but on the weekends I put on my uniform and fight for the Union.
That sounds like a pretty cool job!
It is! I love helping people and I get to work with some great people.
That's awesome! I'm glad you like your job.
